snippet: Jon Niese gave up two home runs in the first two innings, and the Mets were never able to recover against the Astros.
abstract: Houston Astros defeat New York Mets, 6-3. Photos (M)Ø
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON -- Jon Niese made a couple of blunders early in his start Tuesday night, and as a punishment, he was forced to sit and watch in the dugout as his teammates were unable to bail him out. Niese, who likes to get dressed immediately after leaving a game and wait in the clubhouse for his teammates to finish, had to change his routine because his outing was so short.

headline.main: Early Blunders Put Niese On Bench a Long Time
